content:
A year ago I left my 9-5 as a civil engineer in Boston. My wife and I decided it was time for a hard reset. So we took off in a converted church van to travel the US.
We spent everyday hiking and seeing new places – it was the best year of my life.
Our travels landed us in Far West Texas, where we now live off-grid with our dog Bernie.
My favorite colors for new layers in CAD are <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> 140 & <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> 101.

Hi 👋🏼 my name is Kyle 👷🏼‍♂️
I have extensive experience as a civil engineer using AutoCAD Civil 3D for design in both land development and roadway projects. I’ve been through each stage of the project lifecycle many times over, and pair my technical skills with excellent organizational and communication skills.
I’m currently working on building software for civil engineers at <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> CivSoft – which I co-founded with my wife, Chandler.
